# Step class

Represents an abstract step in a sequence managed by the [Trotsky](./trotsky.trotsky.md) framework.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare abstract class Step<P = ParentConstraint, C = unknown, O = unknown> extends Trotsky<P, C, O> 
```
**Extends:** [Trotsky](./trotsky.trotsky.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, C, O&gt;
